markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spell Devourer](/Feats.aspx?ID=4528) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Pervasive Superstition](/Feats.aspx?ID=4524)

</column>

---

You don’t just resist magic; you devour it. Whenever you succeed at a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to double the spell’s rank, or equal to the level if the magical effect isn’t a spell. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your next turn.
name: Spell Devourer

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Spell Devourer Source Player Core pg. 73 2.0 Prerequisites Pervasive Superstition --- You don’t just resist magic; you devour it. Whenever you succeed at a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to double the spell’s rank, or equal to the level if the magical effect isn’t a spell. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your next turn.
